code: import'./Viewsubcategory.css';import axios from'axios';import{_categoryapiurl,_subcategoryapiurl}from'../../api_url';import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useParams,Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Viewsubcategory(){const params=useParams();const[scList,setSubCatList]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get(_subcategoryapiurl+"fetch?catnm="+params.catnm).then(response=>{setSubCatList(response.data);}).catch(err=>{console.log(err);});});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"container-xxl py-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"row g-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"col-lg-12 wow fadeInUp","data-wow-delay":"0.3s",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{class:"mb-4 text-uppercase",children:["Sub Category ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{class:"text-primary",children:["List >>",params.catnm]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("center",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"category_main",children:scList.map(row=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/viewproduct/${row.subcatnm}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"category_part",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`../assets/uploads/subcaticon/${row.subcaticonnm}`,height:"100",width:"150"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:row.subcatnm})]})}))})})]})})})})]});}export default Viewsubcategory;
